name: Star Goddess
description:
You are the pilot of a small ship that is involved by chance in a war between the army of the evil goddess Mirajane and 9 beautiful demigods who want to escape their destiny.
You have to avoid lots of missiles, lasers, bullets and starships, or maybe you can set the difficulty level to “I’m here for the view”, and enjoy the visuals.Features
This game is a combination of shoot 'em up and stripping game.

You will have to save the 9 demigoddes they are:
  • Saori, the sweet, friendly and innocent stewardess.
  • Mei, the confident, strong and competitive cheerleader.
  • Rei, the always responsible policewoman.
  • Yuuki, the calm and intellectual geisha.
  • Misaki, the practical and logical librarian.
  • Ami, the rebellious and provocative schoolgirl.
  • Moka, carefree neko.
  • Ukyo, the nurse.
  • Kotomo, the maid.
  • And of course the evil Star Goddess Mirajane

The game has 3 different difficulty levels

  • Casual (I’m here for the view)
  • Normal
  • Hard (I deserve to be with them)
